metadata.description: Eighteen year-old Sarah is the goddess Athena. Her 'evil' stepmother? Hera, who's actually out to kill her. The bad boy she loves? Hades, king of the underworld. The philandering father whose approval she seeks? Zeus the ultimate deadbeat dad. And now she must take on all of the gods in order to stop them from destroying mankind. Edited by Jimmy Palmiotti.
metadata.name: Headache
